mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book(bNum, userId, bookDate) VALUES(#{bNum}, #{userId}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO book2(b2Num, bNum, sdNum, seat_num, seat_price) VALUES(book2_seq.NEXTVAL, #{bNum}, #{sdNum}, #{seat_num}, #{seat_price})
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(seat_price) amount, subject FROM book2 b JOIN schedule s ON s.sdNum = b.sdNum JOIN performance p ON p.perfNum = s.perfnum WHERE bNum = #{bNum} GROUP BY subject

SELECT hallName hName, t.tNum tNum, t.name tName, seat_num FROM book b JOIN book2 b2 ON b.bNum = b2.bNum JOIN schedule s ON s.sdNum = b2.sdNum JOIN performance p ON p.perfNum = s.perfNum JOIN theater t ON t.tNum = p.tNum JOIN hall h ON h.hNum = t.hallNo WHERE userId = #{userId} AND b.bNum = #{bNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE book SET price = #{price}, amount = #{amount}, state = #{state} WHERE bNum = #{bNum}
